subject: The latest "get out of here" voice
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
From the Aiwa system, starts out "I'm here for Israel..." folowed by "Get
out Of Here--reversed--Great Time", and that is reapeted. Doen wiht a
Panasonic portable auto reversing deck, converted to a reverse speech deck.
